letras: Ring them bells from the sanctuaries/n
For they're deep and they're wide/n
Ring them bells with an iron hand/n
And the sun is going down/n
Ring them bells so the world will know/n
Ring them bells for the blind and the deaf,/n
Ring them bells for all of us who are left,/n
Ring them bells for the chosen few/n
Ring them bells, for the time that flies,/n
Ring them bells St. Catherine/nRing them from the fortress
